text:
The workflow for the default publication in the trunk is broken. The following
steps lead to a NPE. 

1) login as alice
2) Import the default content
3) chose document «concepts»
4) submit
5) reject
6) submit
7) publish

Error: see stacktrace below. 

With the above described normal workflow procedures it is also possible, that a
document is left in an inconsistent state (and another error message). Example
(only accessible today (sorry)):
http://lenya.zones.apache.org:9999/basedondefault/authoring/concepts_de.html


STACKTRACE

text:
I can't confirm this on the zones server.
It looks like the document content is empty, I added a check for this, so the
exception should be more meaningful next time.

Please reopen if the problem persists.
creator: andreas@apache.org
